titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to permit producers on a farm who were prevented from planting the 1993 crop of corn because of a disaster to devote conservation use acreage under the 0/92 program to soybeans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7381)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

bill.summary: 6/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to permit producers who were prevented from planting the 1993 corn crop because of a disaster to devote 0/92 conservation program acreage to soybeans.
